Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
50 Saṃkilesikaduka
Saṃkilesikaduka
69.
214Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkilesiko ca naasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
215Naasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
216Nasaṃkilesikañca naasaṃkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
217Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
